verses.verse: <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H2657>Hephzibah.<s%>

He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> which <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6>destroyed;<s%> and he reared <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H842>Asherah,<s%> as <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and served <S%H5647>them.<s%>

He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"
He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He made his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and practiced <S%H6049>sorcery,<s%> and used <S%H5172>enchantments,<s%> and <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with those who had familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and with <S%H3049>wizards:<s%> he <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

He <S%H7760>set<s%> the engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> of <S%H842>Asherah,<s%> that he had <S%H6213>made,<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> and to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> "In this <S%H1004>house,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> which I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> will I <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%>

neither will I cause the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5110>wander<s%> any <S%H3254>more<s%> out of the <S%H127>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> if only they will <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8451>them,<s%> and according to all the law that my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> commanded <S%H6680>them.<s%>"

But they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen: and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H8582>seduced<s%> them to <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> more than the <S%H1471>nations<s%> did whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Because <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> these <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> and has done <S%H7489>wickedly<s%> above all that the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H6213>did,<s%> who were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3063>him,<s%> and has made Judah also to <S%H2398>sin<s%> with his <S%H1544>idols;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H935><s%> 'Behold, I bring such <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that whoever <S%H8085>hears<s%> of <S%H8147>it,<s%> both his <S%H241>ears<s%> shall <S%H6750>tingle.<s%>

I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> over <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H6957>line<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and the <S%H4949>plummet<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab;<s%> and I will <S%H4229>wipe<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> as a man <S%H4229>wipes<s%> a <S%H6747>dish,<s%> <S%H4229>wiping<s%> it and <S%H2015>turning<s%> it upside <S%H6440>down.<s%>

I will cast <S%H5203>off<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of my <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies.<s%> They will become a <S%H957>prey<s%> and a <S%H4933>spoil<s%> to all their <S%H341>enemies;<s%>

because they have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and have <S%H4480>provoked<s%> me to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>'"

Moreover <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much,<s%> until he had <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from one <S%H6310>end<s%> to <S%H6310>another;<s%> besides his <S%H2403>sin<s%> with which he made <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and all that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>

<S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5798>Uzza:<s%> and <S%H526>Amon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

<S%H526>Amon<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4922>Meshullemeth<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H2743>Haruz<s%> of <S%H3192>Jotbah.<s%>
He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%>

He <S%H3212>walked<s%> in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> that his <S%H1>father<s%> walked <S%H1980>in,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> that his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5647>served,<s%> and worshiped <S%H7812>them:<s%>
and he <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H1980>didn't<s%> walk in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H4428>him,<s%> and put the king to <S%H4191>death<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> all those who had <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H526>Amon;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> made <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> king in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%> which he <S%H6213>did,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>
He was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in his <S%H6900>tomb<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5798>Uzza:<s%> and <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
